comments:
I am connecting to a remote MySQL DB.  I am using version 3.1 for the mysql jdbc.  I am trying the tutorial at this url:

http://dev.mysql.com/tech-resources/articles/using-birt/

When I create a data set and preview it I'm able to connect and preview my data.  But after I start creating my report I am unable to view the data in the BIRT Web Viewer on Preview or Preview it with the Preview tab.  I am getting the following message:

There are errors on the report page: 
- There are error(s) in Table:null 
Error0 : odaconsumer.CannotOpenConnection(1 time)detail: Cannot open the connection for the driver (org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc).Cannot load JDBC Driver class: [com.mysql.jdbc.Driver]. Cannot load JDBC Driver class: [com.mysql.jdbc.Driver]. 

There is also a meta.log file that was created but I don't know if the error in the meta.log has anything to do with it.  The meta.log file:

Can be marked as resolved....needed to put a copy of the mysql jdbc in:
C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer_1.0.1\birt\plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc\drivers
For some reason it wasn't put there automatically but now it works.
